entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. High 10. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
